name: assignment_updated
definition: The event is emitted anytime an assignment is updated by an end user or API request. Only changes to the fields included in the body of the event payload will emit the `updated` event.
trigger: Triggered when an assignment has been modified.

schema.assignment_group_id: The Canvas id of the assignment group.
schema.assignment_id: The Canvas id of the new assignment.
schema.context_id: The Canvas id for the context the assignment is used in.
schema.context_type: The type of context the assignment is used in (usually Course).
schema.context_uuid: The uuid of the context associated with the assignment.
schema.created_on_blueprint_sync: Whether or not the assignment was created in the context of a blueprint sync.
schema.description: The description of the assignment. NOTE: This field will be truncated to only include the first 8192 characters.
schema.due_at: The due date for the assignment.
schema.lock_at: The lock date (assignment is locked after this date).
schema.lti_assignment_id: The LTI assignment guid for the assignment.
schema.lti_resource_link_id: The unique identifier of the assignment resource in the LTI specification. Unique per Canvas shard.
schema.lti_resource_link_id_duplicated_from: The LTI resource link ID of the original assignment. Present if new assigment is a copy.
schema.assignment_id_duplicated__from: The Canvas id of the original assignment.  Present if new assigment is a copy.
schema.domain_duplicated_from: The Canvas domain of the root account of the original assignment. Present if new assigment is a copy.
schema.domain: The Canvas domain of the root account of the assignment.
schema.points_possible: The maximum points possible for the assignment.
schema.submission_types: Valid methods for submitting the assignment, may include multiple comma separated options.
schema.title: The title of the assignment. NOTE: This field will be truncated to only include the first 8192 characters.
schema.unlock_at: The unlock date (assignment is unlocked after this date), or null if not applicable.
schema.updated_at: The time at which this assignment was last modified in any way.
schema.workflow_state: Workflow state of the assignment (deleted, duplicating, failed_to_import, failed_to_duplicate, failed_to_migrate, importing, published, unpublished).
